attributes.action: Stop the introduction of positive Discrimination in the selection of our police officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is here to protest about the suggested introduction of positive discrimination being introduced into the selection process for police forces in the UK. There is no such thing as positive discrimination its always negative and amounts to increasing discrimination towards white hetrosexual Males.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
